description:
From Castlevania swoops in Alucard, a mysterious man who can transform into a bat, and Leon Belmont, a honest man who wields the whip!

This DLC contains the following:
• Alucard *1
• Alucard Sword *2
• Leon Belmont

*1 Alucard cannot use a lantern other than Alucard Sword.
*2 Alucard Sword cannot be used by any character other than Alucard.
name: Castlevania Collaboration Character DLC Bundle
